title: Print Trial, "Flower Seals"
medium: Medium: wool (46%) cotton (39%) and rayon (15%).  Technique: hand printed on plain weave.
description: White plain weave hand printed with horizontal bands of yellow-green, olive green, light green and blue-grey overprinted with a flower pattern in dark blue, blue and violet. Color no. 7d

tombstone.epitaph:
Print Trial, "Flower Seals".
Medium: wool (46%) cotton (39%) and rayon (15%).  Technique: hand printed on plain weave.. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-1281.
